com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.channels

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.clownvin.jtwitchbot.channels.Channel

  • public final class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Calvin Channel is a container object for information about channels and their users.
